Solitaire.title: Solitaire
Solitaire.description: Classic Solitaire! Built using vanilla Javascript. I had two main objectives with this project, the primary one was to learn to collaborate with another developer and learn the processes for sharing a github repo. The other was to learn a wider set of developer tools including webpack and linters, and refine the process of code splitting.
